title.rendered: “Remembering IDF’s Fallen Heroes: Unveiling the Names and Stories of Three Brave Soldiers”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson about the names of three IDF fallen soldiers, which has been notified to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC300520242398571326945

Included is a link to the IDF website, where the details and photos of the fallen are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In the battle in which Sgt. Yedidya Azugi fell, a combatant from Battalion 101, Paratroopers Brigade, was seriously injured.

In addition, two soldiers from Battalion 601, Brigade 401 ‘Desert Reconnaissance Battalion’, Combat Engineering Corps, were severely injured in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

All the fighters were evacuated to receive medical treatment at a hospital and their families were updated.
